items.title: Trump criticises 'decaying' European countries and 'weak' leaders
items.description: The UK praises Europe's "strength" after Trump says countries fail to control migration or take action to end the Ukraine war.

items.title: Artist Nnena Kalu earns 'historic' Turner Prize win
items.description: Kalu wins for her sculptures and drawings, becoming the first learning disabled artist to scoop the award.

items.title: Grooming gangs inquiry to be led by former children's commissioner Anne Longfield
items.description: Baroness Anne Longfield will chair the three-year inquiry which has been beset by problems.

items.title: Fifa accused of breaching own rules with Trump award
items.description: Gianni Infantino is accused of breaking Fifa rules by a campaign group after giving United States President Donald Trump a peace prize.

items.title: Member of UK armed forces dies in accident in Ukraine
items.description: He died in an accident away from Ukraine's front lines on Tuesday, the Ministry of Defence says.
